title: Cotton Waste to Bioethanol
scientific_basis: The process involves pretreatment (shredding), enzymatic hydrolysis, fermentation, distillation
technology_requirements: Shredders, hydrolysis reactors, fermentation tanks, distillation columns
skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Microbiology, Process Operation, Supply Chain Management

title: Cotton Waste to Glucose Syrup
scientific_basis: The process involves acid hydrolysis, neutralization, purification
technology_requirements: Acid-resistant reactors, filtration systems, neutralization tanks, evaporators
skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Industrial Chemistry, Safety Management

title: Polycotton Waste to PEF Monomers
process_description: Selective Hydrolysis (e.g., Avantium Dawn Technology), Catalytic Conversion
scientific_basis: The process involves selective hydrolysis (e.g., avantium dawn technology), catalytic conversion
technology_requirements: Specialized hydrolysis reactors, catalytic converters, separation units
skill_requirements: Organic Chemistry, Catalysis, Chemical Engineering, Polymer Science

title: Mixed Plastic Waste to Fuel Oil
scientific_basis: The process involves pyrolysis, catalytic cracking, distillation
technology_requirements: Pyrolysis reactor, catalytic cracking unit, distillation columns
skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Process Control, Thermochemical Conversion

title: Printed Circuit Boards to Precious Metals
process_description: Mechanical Processing, Hydrometallurgical Leaching, Selective Precipitation
scientific_basis: The process involves mechanical processing, hydrometallurgical leaching, selective precipitation
technology_requirements: Shredders, leaching tanks, precipitation vessels, filtration equipment
skill_requirements: Metallurgical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Analytical Chemistry

title: Orange Peels to Limonene
scientific_basis: The process involves steam distillation, fractionation
technology_requirements: Steam generator, distillation unit, condensers, separation equipment
skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Essential Oil Production, Quality Control

title: Rice Husks to Silica
scientific_basis: The process involves alkali extraction, acid precipitation, calcination
skill_requirements: Materials Science, Process Engineering, Inorganic Chemistry

title: Concrete Waste to Aggregates
scientific_basis: The process involves crushing, screening, contaminant removal
technology_requirements: Jaw crushers, impact crushers, screening equipment, magnetic separators
skill_requirements: Civil Engineering, Materials Testing, Equipment Operation

title: Sawdust to Furfural
scientific_basis: The process involves acid hydrolysis, steam distillation
skill_requirements: Chemical Engineering, Bioproduct Development, Process Control

title: Waste Glass to Foam Glass
scientific_basis: The process involves crushing, mixing, sintering, annealing
technology_requirements: Glass crushers, mixers, tunnel kiln, annealing lehr
skill_requirements: Materials Engineering, Thermal Processing, Quality Control
